trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a value indicating whether this converter can convert an object in the given source type to a Boolean object using the specified context.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xx x Xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if this object can perform the conversion; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Converts the given value object to a Boolean object.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxx xxxxxx xx x Xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

\nvalue is not a valid value for the target type.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xx$xxxxx$$xx$ xx xxx x xxxxx xxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a collection of standard values for the Boolean data type.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxx Xxxxxxx xxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets a value indicating whether this object supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx x xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx x xxxxxxxx xxx xx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xx xxxxxx xxxx x xxxx.$$x$$x
